name: Krumkake Bolt
desc: A bolt engraved with the Krumkake Craftshop's logo. It may serve some purpose there.

value.text:
Reward for reaching Friendship 6 with Ineffa
Reward for reaching Friendship 6 with Aino
Exploration

customize.text: Only characters from the Clink-Clank Krumkake Craftshop can open the Workshop's Trove that Knuckle Duckle guards. Exchange Krumkake Bolts gained while exploring for marvelous items exclusive to Aino and Ineffa.
You can receive 1 Krumkake Bolt each for reaching Friendship 6 with Aino and Ineffa.
You can receive 1 Krumkake Bolt each for encountering Aino and Ineffa a certain number of times in Character Anecdotes.
You can receive 1 Krumkake Bolt each for exploring the Clink-Clank Krumkake Craftshop and Kuuvahki Experimental Design Bureau, as well as completing the World Quest "Friends of Moleyvalley."
You can receive 1 Krumkake Bolt for upgrading Aino's Krumkake Craftshop Console to Level 4.
Only Aino and Ineffa can exchange Krumkake Bolt with

customize.name: Knuckle Duckle
customize.desc:
A kuuvahki mechanism of peculiar make, made from scrap metal and mechanical bearings, that bears a partial resemblance — as per its creator's proclivities, apparently — to a "duck."
Its output and resistance to damage are comparable to the Fatui's most cutting-edge warfighting weaponry... But even so, it remains simply a toy duck that can punch its opponents very, very hard. A creator's preferences will always do much to determine a creation's appearance, as clay lacks the authority to question its creator's choice of molds. The world beneath the moon has long been sculpted into a form that people take for granted, but in the eyes of its original inhabitants, that form must surely be like a peculiar duck, shaped by its creator's bizarre predilections.
Of course, the blue-haired maid would never say any such thing to the mistress of the Krumkake Craftshop — after all, ducks are adorable, especially compared to the world's present aspect.

customize.name: Aino's Toolbox
customize.desc: A toolbox stored in the Workshop's Trove. Instead of tools, it contains a mysterious accessory.

customize.name: Krumkake Bolt
customize.desc: A bolt engraved with the Krumkake Craftshop's logo. It may serve some purpose there.
